Plot: A stressed father, a bride-to-be with a secret, a smitten event planner, and relatives from around the world create much ado about the preparations for an arranged marriage in India.
Title: Monsoon Wedding
Actors: Naseeruddin Shah, Lillete Dubey, Shefali Shetty, Vijay Raaz
tomatoConsensus: An insightful, energetic blend of Hollywood and Bollywood styles, Monsoon Wedding is a colorful, exuberant celebration of modern-day India, family, love, and life.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 11 nominations.
